body_text:
Meet setIn. He understands your pain.
Except, wait, can you use this? The state is not immutable until you get to collections?
body:
Meet [setIn](https://facebook.github.io/immutable-js/docs/#/Map/setIn). He understands your pain.

Except, wait, can you use this? The state is not immutable until you get to collections?
